verbose_text: For all substrates the diastereoselectivity could be increased significantly by carrying out the reactions in a less polar solvent (toluene) compared to previously used DMF, suggesting a greater stabilization of the diradical intermediate A in the first.28 In comparison to that, gel media showed a rather small effect on the diastereomeric outcome of the reaction and tended to have a relatively greater impact in polar solvents like DMF or CH 3 CN than in unpolar solvents (toluene).
